item.description:
Let's go see Chasing Mavericks. Friday is the official opening day. There is an 8:30 showing at the Loews Boston Common theater. Tickets are $12, and I recommend buying them in advance online because this show might sell out since it is opening night.

Let's meet at 7:45 in the entrance area of the theater, and head in at 8:00 to get some good seats.

This looks like a great film, and it'll be fun to see on the big screen I think.

for info on the film, and to buy tickets visit:

http://www.fandango.com/chasingmavericks_149369/movieoverview?date=10/26/2012

anyone know a good bar nearby? i'll be heading over right after work and would be up for grabbing a drink ahead of time if anyone is up for that. suggestions welcome!
item.name: Chasing Mavericks 8:30 showing
